Breadth-First.Explanation: General clue collection by observing man-made elements and sculptures
Broad exploration of symbolism and architectural style without a specific location hypothesis

Depth-First.Explanation: Proposes and begins verifying Seville Cathedral hypothesis
Confirms final location using photographic and architectural evidence
Final cross-verification and formatting of confirmed location

Breadth-Depth Switch.Explanation: Shift from gathering broad symbolic clues to verifying a specific location hypothesis
